\title{Short Essay 3}
\date{}

\begin{document}
\maketitle





\subsection{Prompt}\label{prompt}

After declaring the ideal city established, Socrates turns to locate the
four virtues---wisdom, courage, moderation, and justice---in it
(427d-434d). Write four paragraphs, one for each of the virtues. Each
paragraph must explain what the relevant virtue is and explain what
Socrates thinks it means for a city to possess that virtue.

\paragraph{Further Instruction}\label{further-instruction}

\begin{itemize}
\itemsep1pt\parskip0pt\parsep0pt
\item
  Write 400-600 words. No more. No less.
\item
  Submit your responses by Mon. @ 1pm.
\end{itemize}

\end{document}
